This site provides a version controlled and computationally reproducible record of analysis for *Facial and Electrodermal responses to music across alexithymia*

You can navigate to pages describing each step of the anbalysis (except for the psychophysiology pre-processing) using the top bar. Interpretation will be progressively added to the site. 

# Contents
## [Data Preparation](data_cleaning.html)
## [Descriptives of Self Report](describe.html)
## [Self Reported Affect](AffectRatings.html)


The data used can be accessed in this [folder](https://github.com/joellarwood/AlexithymiaMusicAffectPsychophysiology2019/tree/master/data) on the project [repository](https://github.com/joellarwood/AlexithymiaMusicAffectPsychophysiology2019). You can also se archives of my work on this project data to early 2019 in this [folder](https://github.com/joellarwood/AlexithymiaMusicAffectPsychophysiology2019/tree/master/Archives)
